title: Happy Birthday, Emma-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Emma-san, happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Congratulations on your birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Thank you! I want to congratulate you all too.
